attributes.additional_details:
Children need a longer holiday to properly relax ,go around, enjoy, be a little independent and return to school ready and refreshed.
Also with this parents should be given at least a day for each school break to spend with their children . Apart from the other holidays they get from work.
attributes.background: Students spend long terms in school and often school breaks are so or quite short. Homework/revision limits us from doing things.

rejection.details: The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils.
